title: A battle over who is the true progressive defines L.A. congressional race
dc:creator: Jeong Park
description: The 2022 midterm race to represent California's 34th Congressional District between Congressman Jimmy Gomez and David Kim is about what it means to be a progressive.
content:encoded: The 2022 midterm race to represent California's 34th Congressional District between Congressman Jimmy Gomez and David Kim is about what it means to be a progressive.

media:content.media:description: David Kim participates in a Town Hall at Glassell Park Center in Los Angeles. Representative Jimmy Gomez talks about the expanded Child Tax Credit at a press conference held at Barrio Action Youth and Family Center. (Genaro Molina / Los Angeles Times) (Irfan Khan / Los Angeles Times)
